description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'HomeShell' that manages main navigation with a bottom tab bar, displaying different screens for vocabulary, phrases, and practice features in a French learning app.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides main navigation structure with a bottom navigation bar.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget, returning an instance of _HomeShellState.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: State class managing current tab index and rendering the appropriate screen.

methods.name: _HomeShellState
methods.description: State class for HomeShell widget, contains build method to render UI.
